data.title: SAG-AFTRA Foundation
meta_keywords: Sara Sherman's All About Animation Workshop
data.meta_description: If the event is full, add your name to the waitlist!Sara Sherman knows animation.  She is all about it. She is a veteran of the industry and continues to bring memorable animated characters to life through the numerous successful series' she oversees.  In this workshop, Sara will take you through various aspects of character development and help you free those inner voices that could one day play a part in the next big thing in animation.  About our guest instructor:Sara Sherman has been casting cartoons for Disney Television Animation for the past 9 years and has worked at the company for over ten. Currently she oversees the casting on Disney Channel’s hit animated shows PHINEAS AND FERB, GRAVITY FALLS, and WANDER OVER YONDER, as well as a new Disney series, STAR VS. THE FORCES OF EVIL. Other casting credits include: FISH HOOKS, MICKEY MOUSE CLUBHOUSE, YIN YANG YO, CLUB PENGUIN, and SUPER ROBOT MONKEY TEAM HYPERFORCE GO!  She is also responsible for the casts on all animated Disney Channel pilots. Additionally, Sara handles Talent Relations for all TV animation and Disney Junior series.  Prior to joining to Disney, Sara worked in development at Klasky Csupo known for RUGRATS and AS TOLD BY GINGER and Gullane Entertainment known for THOMAS THE TANK ENGINE. She started her career as Steven Bochco’s production assistant
data.text:
If the event is full, add your name to the waitlist!

Sara Sherman knows animation. She is all about it. She is a veteran of the industry and continues to bring memorable animated characters to life through the numerous successful series' she oversees. In this workshop, Sara will take you through various aspects of character development and help you free those inner voices that could one day play a part in the next big thing in animation.

About our guest instructor:

Sara Sherman has been casting cartoons for Disney Television Animation for the past 9 years and has worked at the company for over ten. Currently she oversees the casting on Disney Channel’s hit animated shows PHINEAS AND FERB, GRAVITY FALLS, and WANDER OVER YONDER, as well as a new Disney series, STAR VS. THE FORCES OF EVIL. Other casting credits include: FISH HOOKS, MICKEY MOUSE CLUBHOUSE, YIN YANG YO, CLUB PENGUIN, and SUPER ROBOT MONKEY TEAM HYPERFORCE GO! She is also responsible for the casts on all animated Disney Channel pilots. Additionally, Sara handles Talent Relations for all TV animation and Disney Junior series.
